sentences.en: A flood of this sort is really unprecedented.
sentences.cn: 这样大的洪水真是十年九不遇.

sentences.en: China's industry is developing at an unprecedented rate.
sentences.cn: 中国工业正以空前的速度发展.

sentences.en: China's population is aging at unprecedented levels.
sentences.cn: 使中国人口老龄化达到了前所未有的水平.

sentences.en: Crime has increased on an unprecedented scale.
sentences.cn: 犯罪率增幅之大前所未有。

sentences.en: Each home boasts an unprecedented level of quality throughout.
sentences.cn: 每家的质量都堪称一流。

sentences.en: Expenditure raced up and up to an unprecedented level.
sentences.cn: 消费不断地急剧上升,达到了空前的水准.

sentences.en: Footballers launched an unprecedented crusade against racism on the terraces.
sentences.cn: 足球运动员们对阶梯看台上的种族歧视发起了一场空前的运动。

sentences.en: For churches not normally noted for their ability to act in unison, today's unprecedented move was all the more remarkable.
sentences.cn: 对于通常无法统一行动的各个教会来说，今天这一前所未有的举动无疑更加非同寻常。

sentences.en: Gold, silver, and enamelled work were done with an unprecedented brilliance.
sentences.cn: 金 、 银和珐琅装饰品都制造得空前地璀璨夺目.

sentences.en: He took the unprecedented step of stating that the rumours were false.
sentences.cn: 他史无前例地声明那些谣言实属子虚乌有。

sentences.en: In an unprecedented action, the army, on its own initiative, arrested seventeen civilians.
sentences.cn: 军队竟然擅自逮捕了17个平民, 这种行为简直是前所未有.

sentences.en: In that incredible, in that unprecedented uproar, the ministers sat petrified.
sentences.cn: 大臣们在那一阵不可思议, 前所未有的喧闹声中, 正襟危坐、呆若木鸡.

sentences.en: Such a move is rare, but not unprecedented.
sentences.cn: 这样的举动少见，但并非从来没有过。

sentences.en: The unprecedented problems took their place.
sentences.cn: 一大堆前所未闻的问题产生了.

sentences.en: There were no rules here, because we were in an unprecedented situation.
sentences.cn: 这儿毫无规律可言, 因为我们面临的形势是史无前例的.

sentences.en: This achievement was unprecedented in automobile history.
sentences.cn: 这种成就在汽车业中是史无前例的.

sentences.en: This caused an almost unprecedented turbulence in the foreign exchange markets.
sentences.cn: 这导致了几乎是外汇市场的空前大混乱.

trans.tran_cn: 前所未有的，无前例的，空前的，无比的，新奇的，崭新的
trans.tran_en: never having happened before, or never having happened so much
